text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi Mr President, please get Godly counsel before you endorse any vaccines for the Coronavirus!  Americans will not take!!!!   I am extremely disappointed by Lindsey Graham appointing Bill Gates to be over WHO.  This man cannot be truested in anyway!!!!!!!!!!!!
